experience: You and Madison both know Ben Smith, Christopher Stark, and 33 others
Team Captain AZ - Keller Williams Legacy One Realty
Providing great customer service, utilizing time management skills, and properly handling stressful situations.

My position is classified in the Marketing portion of our internal and external positions. Although this job is unpaid, there are many responsibilities that go beyond the title. Managing our sorority’s Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, Instagram, and website daily while updating them with the different events we have is the main part of my position. I also create some of our logos and graphics through Adobe programs such as Illustrator and Photoshop. This past year I was in charge of holding multiple photo shoots and creating our 2015 Pre-Recruitment video. Creating our Pre-Recruitment video included promoting it through different organizations, and launching it to the rest of the nation on a mass scale. Although it can be time consuming at some times, I am very organized in managing it with my time, and it is something I truly enjoy doing.
recommendations: Senior Area Sales Manager | OLS Hotels & Resorts
April 8, 2016, Madison reported directly to J. Michael

Throughout the duration of my time at the Graduate Tempe Hotel as the Social Media/Public Relations intern, Michael Brouse, my internship manager, has consistently been a pleasure to work with. His strong ability to ensure that potential clients are happy and educated regarding the hotel shows his charismatic personality, and in turn helps the sales department immensely. The determination Michael had to make our booth at Phoenix Pride 2016 run smoothly and efficiently was admirable, which shows that he is able to successfully plan out and execute anything he is presented with. I receive some independent work in my internship with Michael, such as designing flyers and other forms of visual communication to promote the Graduate Tempe. This freedom given to me shows that Michael is trusting of his coworkers, and believes both in the individual success of each team member and the overall success of the team. There has never been an instance where I have felt misinformed or confused on any project or event, and Michael’s strong leadership skills are highlighted every time. With Michael’s charisma, efficiency, and sense of leadership, I truly believe he is able to fit into any potential role he may be presented with.

summary: I am a student majoring in Design Management at Arizona State University with a certificate in Sales and Marketing Essentials. I am a hardworking and driven student, and thrive in a team setting and independently.
